commentary_sequence.speaker: Analyst
commentary_sequence.text: The Panthers are doing a good job of keeping the Oilers pinned in their own zone. Edmonton is having trouble breaking out cleanly.

commentary_sequence.speaker: Host
commentary_sequence.text: They're exchanging shots, but Florida's definitely generating more sustained pressure. Edmonton needs to tighten things up defensively if they want to get back in this one.
